```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```






```{r}


AvenidaFrancia = read.table('DATOS/AvenidaFrancia.txt', header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("", "NA"))

BulevarSur = read.table('DATOS/BulevarSur.txt', header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("", "NA"))

Centre= read.table('DATOS/Centre.txt', header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("", "NA"))


LlicAnticTuria= read.table('DATOS/LlicAnticTuria.txt', header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("", "NA"))


MoliDelSol= read.table('DATOS/MoliDelSol.txt', header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("", "NA"))


Olivereta= read.table('DATOS/Olivereta.txt', header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("", "NA"))


PistaDeSilla= read.table('DATOS/PistaDeSilla.txt', header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("", "NA"))


Puerto= read.table('DATOS/Puerto.txt', header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("", "NA"))



UPV= read.table('DATOS/UPV.txt', header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("", "NA"))



Viveros= read.table('DATOS/Viveros.txt', header = TRUE, sep = "\t", na.strings = c("", "NA"))



```

```{r}
library(lubridate)
```


Fechas

```{r}


AvenidaFrancia$FECHA = as.Date(AvenidaFrancia$FECHA, format="%d/%m/%Y")
BulevarSur$FECHA = as.Date(BulevarSur$FECHA, format="%d/%m/%Y")
Centre$FECHA = as.Date(Centre$FECHA, format="%d/%m/%Y")
LlicAnticTuria$FECHA = as.Date(LlicAnticTuria$FECHA, format="%d/%m/%Y")
MoliDelSol$FECHA = as.Date(MoliDelSol$FECHA, format="%d/%m/%Y")
Olivereta$FECHA = as.Date(Olivereta$FECHA, format="%d/%m/%Y")
PistaDeSilla$FECHA = as.Date(PistaDeSilla$FECHA, format="%d/%m/%Y")
Puerto$FECHA = as.Date(Puerto$FECHA, format="%d/%m/%Y")
UPV$FECHA = as.Date(UPV$FECHA, format="%d/%m/%Y")
Viveros$FECHA = as.Date(Viveros$FECHA, format="%d/%m/%Y")



```








```{r}
plot(MoliDelSol$PM2.5 , MoliDelSol$PM10)
plot(MoliDelSol$PM2.5 , MoliDelSol$PM1)


```
We can use just 1 of them


```{r}
BulevarSur$PM2.5 = NA
Viveros$PM2.5 = NA

Centre$SO2 = NA
Olivereta$SO2 = NA

Centre$O3 = NA
Olivereta$O3 = NA

BulevarSur$CO = NA
Centre$CO = NA
Olivereta$CO = NA
UPV$CO = NA
Viveros$CO = NA
```


```{r}
AvenidaFrancia = AvenidaFrancia[, c(1, 2 , 3 , 6 , 8 , 9 , 11 , 12 , 7)]
BulevarSur = BulevarSur[, c(1, 2 , 9 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 7 , 8 , 10)]
Centre = Centre[, c(1, 2 , 3 , 8 , 4 , 5 , 7 , 9 , 10)]
LlicAnticTuria = LlicAnticTuria[, c(1, 2 , 3 , 11 , 13 , 14 , 16 , 17 , 12)]
MoliDelSol = MoliDelSol[, c(1, 2 , 3 , 5 , 7 , 8, 10 , 11 , 6)]
Olivereta = Olivereta[, c(1, 2 , 3 , 8 , 4 , 5 , 7 , 9 , 10)]
PistaDeSilla = PistaDeSilla[, c(1, 2 , 3 , 7 , 9 , 10 , 12 , 13 , 8)]
Puerto = Puerto[, c(1, 2 , 3 , 11 , 13 , 14 , 16 , 17 , 12)]
UPV = UPV[, c(1, 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 8 , 9 , 10)]
Viveros = Viveros[, c(1, 2 , 8 , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 7 , 9)]


```




```{r}
# Para AvenidaFrancia
AvenidaFrancia$CO = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", AvenidaFrancia$CO))

# Para BulevarSur
BulevarSur$CO = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", BulevarSur$CO))

# Y as√≠ sucesivamente para cada dataframe y cada columna que necesite ser convertida
Centre$CO = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", Centre$CO))
LlicAnticTuria$CO = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", LlicAnticTuria$CO))
MoliDelSol$CO = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", MoliDelSol$CO))
Olivereta$CO = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", Olivereta$CO))
PistaDeSilla$CO = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", PistaDeSilla$CO))
Puerto$CO = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", Puerto$CO))
UPV$CO = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", UPV$CO))
Viveros$CO = as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", Viveros$CO))

```





```{r}
save (AvenidaFrancia, BulevarSur , Centre , LlicAnticTuria , MoliDelSol , Olivereta , PistaDeSilla , Puerto , UPV , Viveros , file = 'Data.RData')
```
